statements: UPDATE task_list SET task_name = 'Shopping List', task_description = 'Buy groceries' WHERE task_id = 1
UPDATE task_list SET deadline = '2022-10-30', task_name = 'Meeting Preparation' WHERE task_id = 2
UPDATE task_list SET task_name = 'New Task Name', deadline = '2022-12-31' WHERE task_id = 1;
UPDATE task_list SET task_description = 'Updated Task Description', task_name = 'Task 2' WHERE deadline < '2022-11-30';
UPDATE TaskList SET task_description = 'Updated description' WHERE task_id = 1;
UPDATE ProjectDeadlines SET deadline_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE project_name = 'Project X';
UPDATE TaskList SET task_description = 'New description', task_deadline = '2022-12-31' WHERE task_id = 1;
UPDATE ProjectDeadlines SET deadline_date = '2023-06-15', project_description = 'Updated project description' WHERE project_id = 2;
UPDATE tasks SET task_name = 'Study', task_description = 'Complete math assignment' WHERE task_id = 1;
UPDATE user_tasks SET start_date = '2022-10-15', end_date = '2022-10-30' WHERE user_id = 1 AND task_id = 3;
UPDATE tasks SET task_description = 'Update SQL statement example 1' WHERE task_id = 1
UPDATE projects SET project_description = 'Update SQL statement example 2', end_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE project_id = 2
UPDATE task_lists SET status='Completed' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE projects SET assigned_to='Alice' WHERE project_id=2;
UPDATE task_lists SET due_date = '2022-12-31', status = 'In Progress' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE projects SET assigned_to = 'John Doe', deadline = '2022-10-15' WHERE project_id = 5;
UPDATE daily_tasks SET task_description = 'New description' WHERE task_id = 1;
UPDATE projects SET end_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE project_id = 3;
UPDATE daily_tasks SET task_description = 'New description for task' WHERE task_id = 1;
UPDATE tasks_assigned SET assignment_id = 3, assigned_to = 'John Doe' WHERE task_id = 2 AND project_id = 1;
